org.pikater.web.sharedresources

Class ResourceRegistrar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.sharedresources.ResourceRegistrar

  • public class ResourceRegistrar
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of sharing "resources" (technically anything, even class instances) between threads or server-client pairs. Resources used are required to be "accessible" from user session (and thus tied to it), unless they have an explicit expiration time set.
    This restriction refers to the registerResource(VaadinSession, IRegistrarResource) method.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl

    • Method Detail

      • registerResource

        public static java.util.UUID registerResource(com.vaadin.server.VaadinSession session,
                              IRegistrarResource resource)
                                       throws ResourceException
        This is the base method for creating download URLs. First, a resource mapping needs to be created, resource ID returned (which is what this method returns) and then a download URL may be constructed with getDownloadURL(UUID).
        Throws:
        ResourceException

      • isResourceRegistered

        public static boolean isResourceRegistered(java.util.UUID resourceID)
        Returns whether a resource is mapped to the given ID.

      • getResource

        public static IRegistrarResource getResource(java.util.UUID resourceID)
        Gets the resource associated with the given ID. Mind that resource may expire on first pickup and using this method may expire the returned resource.

      • fromResourceID

        public static java.lang.String fromResourceID(java.util.UUID resourceID)
        Translates the given resource ID to a token (String) so it can be passed (for instance) to another UI as an URL parameter.

      • toResourceID

        public static java.util.UUID toResourceID(java.lang.String resourceToken)
                                   throws ResourceException
        Translates the given token constructed with the fromResourceID(UUID) method into a resource ID.
        Throws:
        ResourceException

      • handleError

        public static void handleError(java.lang.Exception e,
               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
        Handles exceptions thrown from methods of this class. If the exception is an unknown error case, this method will throw a RuntimeException and output HttpServletResponse.SC_NOT_FOUND error status. RuntimeExceptions will be caught by the default UI error handler and a visible notification will be displayed to user.

      • getDownloadURL

        public static java.lang.String getDownloadURL(java.util.UUID resourceID)
                                       throws ResourceException
        Creates a download URL for the given resource ID. The associated resource must be an instance of IDownloadResource. The returned URL points to DynamicDownloadServlet.
        Throws:
        ResourceException

      • expireOnFirstPickupResource

        public static void expireOnFirstPickupResource(java.util.UUID resourceID,
                               IRegistrarResource resource)
        Expires a resource that was to be expired on first pickup.

      • expireSessionResources

        public static void expireSessionResources(com.vaadin.server.VaadinSession session)
        Method to be used when a resource expires.
